Interface LogFormatter.EventFormatter

All Superinterfaces:
LogFormatter
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractStandardEventFormatter, JansiLogFormatter, StandardEventFormatter
Enclosing interface:
LogFormatter
Functional Interface:
This is a functional interface and can therefore be used as the assignment target for a lambda expression or method reference.
@FunctionalInterface public static non-sealed interface LogFormatter.EventFormatter extends LogFormatter
Generic event formatting that is lambda friendly.
